Name: Lil Fishy
Notes: Direct chase enemy - common in lakes and reefs

Name: Jelly
Notes: Fragile swarm - found in shallows and reefs

Name: Noodle Boy
Notes: Fast horde jellyfish - ocean to abyss

Name: Comb Jelly
Notes: Heavy armor (10) - exclusive to the deep

Name: Garden Eel
Notes: Very fast skirmisher with bubble shots

Name: Crab Boss
Notes: Boss crab - spike ring and meteors
